sentences.english: Our goal is to create the greatest, and best M&M server.
sentences.chinese: 我們的目標是打造最權威，最穩定的幻靈。

sentences.english: He's a pre-eminent authority in the field of bio-chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 他是生化學這個領域最傑出的權威人士。

sentences.english: Our products have passed authoritative certification and all quality indexes are in line with international standard.
sentences.chinese: 產品的質量經過權威認證，各項指標均達到國家標準。

sentences.english: Bureaucratic organizations strain the use of rules, regulations, procedures, policies and hierarchal authority.
sentences.chinese: 官僚機構勞損了規則，規定，程序，政策和層次權威。

sentences.english: In the case of non-Euclidean geometry he published no definitive work.
sentences.chinese: 至於非歐幾里德幾何，他沒有發表過權威性的著作。

sentences.english: Don't be overawed by authorities and big names.
sentences.chinese: 不要被權威名人所嚇倒。

sentences.english: The site is an authority in its niche.
sentences.chinese: 網站在其所處行業是權威站點。

sentences.english: He sets himself up as an authority on art.
sentences.chinese: 他自命爲藝術方面的權威。

sentences.english: It is the mechanism of "authority-propelled press freedom".
sentences.chinese: 筆者分析的理論框架是權威主義和合作主義理論。

sentences.english: The rural country needs to form authority and decide the rights of developments dependently.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村社會要形成權威，自主決定鄉村教育的發展權。

sentences.english: The speaker Professor Jiali He is the authority of the Relay Protection.
sentences.chinese: 演講者賀家李教授是繼電保護方面的權威。

sentences.english: In UK the law derives its authority, expressly or impliedly, from Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，法律的權威，明示或着暗示地，來自於議會。

sentences.english: Second only to God on their flagships , admirals are unreceptive to orders from anyone.
sentences.chinese: 海軍司令在旗艦上有無上權威，不聽任何人命令。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism also holds the notion that Precious Umbrella symbolizes the power of Buddha's edification.
sentences.chinese: 藏傳佛教亦認爲，寶傘象徵着佛陀教誨的權威。

sentences.english: He is the figure of authority that we have to deal with.
sentences.chinese: 他是伊朗的權威人物，我們必須跟他打交道。

sentences.english: There is a certification authority is in line with the national electrical safety standards.
sentences.chinese: 有具備權威認證，是符合國家電工安全產品標準。

definition: peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
